title: e
clause_text: e.g. for the roads as mentioned at Sr.No.3 in Table No.6-G, the maximum building potential shall be considered as given at Sr.No.4.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
